title: Bold Outline
description: Ce style graphique se distingue par des contours noirs épais et uniformes entourant des aplats de couleurs vives sans aucun dégradé. L'esthétique rappelle le pop art et les icônes vectorielles modernes, privilégiant la clarté géométrique et un fort contraste visuel.
prompt: A bold, minimalist vector illustration of {{subject}} rendered in a clean 'ligne claire' style. The design features thick, uniform black outlines defining every shape, contrasting sharply against flat, saturated color fills. The color palette is dominated by {{primary_color}} with striking highlights in {{accent_color}}. There are no gradients, shadows, or textures; the aesthetic is purely 2D, graphic, and icon-like. The composition is centered and symmetrical, reminiscent of a high-quality sticker, patch design, or modern clip art. The forms are simplified and geometric, prioritizing readability and visual punch over realism. The background is a solid, untextured hue that makes the central figure stand out immediately, vector art, thick lines, flat color, cel shaded, sticker art, pop art, 2d, minimalist, clean lines
